Package com.composum.pages.commons

Class PagesConfigImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.composum.pages.commons.PagesConfigImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PagesConfiguration
    public class PagesConfigImpl
extends Object
implements PagesConfiguration
    The configuration service for all servlets in the Pages module.
